divs: Sighting Detailswatering grass early (7 am) on a hot hazy morning. saw large round red glowing object moving somewhat slowly in sky...very steady path...moving from west (lake michigan) to east. never wavered and absolutly no sound. it was low enough not to be blocked from morning foggy haze.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Holland
There were no other sightings in Holland on or around July 14th 2012
Summary: red flowing object moving slow and steady below hazy morning fog from west (lake michigan) going east...completely silent
